tags: meant to put the second part under a read more but tumblr hates me specifically
summary:
one year ago today // ii philly 6.26.18
honestly, i barely remember my ii show. last year was so chaotic and i was in such a...
body:
one year ago today // ii philly 6.26.18

honestly, i barely remember my ii show. last year was so chaotic and i was in such a dark place emotionally that such genuinely good days like this feel like they might have never happened. but it did happen, and it was one of the best days of my life. i started watching dan and phil when i was 13, and i don’t know who i’d be now without the escape from my life watching their videos gave me, or the friends i’ve made because of them. things are much better now, but dnp and this fandom will always be special to me.

reblog.comment:

summary: phil always has such a specific weird energy around pj, like he’s playful but in a different way than with anyone else i’ve seen...
